Classes
Class
Description
Bishop
Represents a Bishop chess piece.
Board
Represents a chessboard with an 8x8 grid of squares.
Game
Main class to run a console-based chess game.
King
Represents a King piece in chess.
Knight
Represents a Knight chess piece.
Pawn
Represents a Pawn chess piece.
Piece
Represents a generic chess piece.
Player
Represents a chess player in the game.
Position
Represents a position on a chessboard using 0-based row and column indices.
Queen
Represents a Queen chess piece.
Rook
Represents a Rook chess piece.

Test class for Chess pieces, moves, and game mechanics.
Utils
